TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SiteIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SiteIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class SiteIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: 定義程式碼來源網站的身份識別權限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the Web site from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別，便可確保呼叫端會從特定網站。Using this class, it is possible to ensure that callers are from a specific Web site. 網站識別只定義使用 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 的通訊協定的程式碼的 Url。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站台是之間的字串"/ /"的 URL 和下列通訊協定之後"/"，如果有的話，例如，在 URL 中 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 這不包括連接埠號碼。This excludes port numbers. 如果給定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站台是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 網站可以完全相符，或者使用萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站台名稱字串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 符合 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。不使用萬用字元，站台名稱必須完全相符。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站台名稱字串 \* 會比對任何站台，但不是會符合任何網站辨識項的程式碼。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別權限的要求是有效的即使是完全受信任的呼叫組件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但識別權限的要求會失敗組件不符合要求的準則。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限的要求是如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任的效果不佳。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會識別權限的特殊情況的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用方法，以防止不當存取系統資源所信任的程式碼。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 現在已過時，和資源的存取權現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制存取檔案，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並指派給它的權限程式碼可以存取的資源。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 如需在沙箱中執行應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完全限制的狀態符合任何站台。The fully restricted state of matches no sites. 這個建構函式是為了與其他權限，設計的一致性，但不是有用的作法。This constructor is included for consistency with the design of other permissions, but is not useful in practice. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定會成功，不論的身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別權限的要求是有效的即使是完全受信任的呼叫組件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但識別權限的要求會失敗組件不符合要求的準則。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限的要求是如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任的效果不佳。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會識別權限的特殊情況的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 值。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid value of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string site) cil managed

param.name: site
param.span: 網站名稱或萬用字元運算式。

span.span: The site name or wildcard expression.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以表示指定的站台識別。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to represent the specified site identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網站識別只定義使用 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 的通訊協定的程式碼的 Url。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站台是之間的字串"/ /"的 URL 和下列通訊協定之後"/"，如果有的話，例如，在 URL 中 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. 這不包括連接埠號碼。This excludes port numbers. 如果給定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站台是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 網站可以完全相符，或者使用萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站台名稱字串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 符合 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。不使用萬用字元，站台名稱必須完全相符。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.

exception.span: 參數不是有效的字串，或不符合有效的萬用字元站台名稱。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid string, or does not match a valid wildcard site name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Copy () As IPermission

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權限的複本表示相同的存取權的資源或相同的站台識別與原始的權限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources or the same site identity as the original permission.

The parameter's version number is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限交集是描述它們都共同描述網站的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the sites they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 例如，代表權限存取 www.fourthcoffee.com，另一種表示的存取權的交集 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 是表示 www.fourthcoffee.com 的存取權限。For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com and one that represents access to \*.fourthcoffee.com is a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com. 兩個相同的站台識別權限的交集是相同的權限。The intersection of two identical site identity permissions is the same permission. 交集的兩個不同 （沒有萬用字元） 的運算式是空的權限。The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission. 交集的萬用字元運算式，而且比對的站台是站台。The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching site is the site. 比對的兩個萬用字元運算式的交集是較長，更具體的兩個運算式。The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限指定的站台完全包含所指定的權限，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a site that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 下表顯示的值某一範圍的值目前的權限與指定權限。The following table shows the value of for a range of values of the current permission and the specified permission. |目前權限Current Permission|指定權限Specified Permission|IsSubsetOfIsSubsetOf| |------------------------|--------------------------|----------------| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|`true`| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|www.tailspintoys.comwww.tailspintoys.com|`false`| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|`true`| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|\*.com\*.com|`true`| |\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|`false`| |\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|`true`| |\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|\*.com\*.com|`true`| |以外的項目 `None`Anything except `None`|*|`true`| |`None`|任何項目Anything|`true`|

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Site { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前的網站。

span.span: Gets or sets the current site.
The current site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網站識別只定義使用 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 的通訊協定的程式碼的 Url。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站台是之間的字串"/ /"的 URL 和下列通訊協定之後"/"，如果有的話，例如，在 URL 中 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. 這不包括連接埠號碼。This excludes port numbers. 如果給定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站台是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 網站可以完全相符，或者使用萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站台名稱字串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 符合 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。不使用萬用字元，站台名稱必須完全相符。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站台名稱字串 \* 會比對任何站台，但不是會符合任何網站辨識項的程式碼。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence.

exception.span: 無法擷取網站身分識別，因為它的身分識別模稜兩可。

span.span: The site identity cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToXml () As SecurityElement

summary.span: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.

returns.span: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示所有站台代表由目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the sites represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 例如，代表權限存取 www.fourthcoffee.com，另一種表示的存取權的聯集 *。 fourthcoffee.com 是表示的存取權的權限 *。 fourthcoffee.com。For example, the union of a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com and one that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com is a permission that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com. 權限的聯集和`null`是不是使用權限`null`。The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`. 權限的聯集和該權限的子集是包含子集合的權限。The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the subset. 任何其他組合會產生擲回。Any other combination results in an being thrown. 比方說，站台識別 www.fourthcoffee.com 和站台識別 www.tailspintoys.com 的 union 造成例外狀況都不是因為另一個子集。For example, the union of the site identity www.fourthcoffee.com and the site identity www.tailspintoys.com results in an exception because neither is a subset of the other.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

exception.span: 兩個權限不相等，且其中一個權限不是另一個權限的子集。

span.span: The permissions are not equal and one is not a subset of the other.
